abstract: Citigroup analysts give the stock a buy rating based on valuation and the belief that the worst could be over for the giant hedge fund manager.
snippet: Citigroup analysts give the stock a buy rating based on valuation and the belief that the worst could be over for the giant hedge fund manager.
lead_paragraph: Shares of the Man Group, the world’s largest publicly traded hedge fund company, surged in London trading on Wednesday after Citigroup analysts recommended the stock.

headline.main: Battered Man Group Shares Get a Boost
